description: Task sync & management CLI for Claude Code with TOON format. Supports Linear and Trello. Token-efficient workflow with local cycle cache, smart task selection, multi-team support, and Claude Code plugin integration.
rules: Use TypeScript with ES modules (type: module)
CLI commands are defined in bin/ and scripts/ directories
Claude Code plugin commands are in commands/ directory as .md files
Skills for Claude Code are in skills/ directory
TOON format files (.toon) are used for configuration and cycle data
Supports both remote (immediate sync) and local (offline-first) modes
Adapter pattern in lib/adapters/ abstracts Linear vs Trello differences
